description: This is a simple example of a Next.js application with i18n support via next-i18next.
title: A simple example

sse.noMessages: No messages yet. Connect and send some events!
sse.demoDescription: This page demonstrates the SSE (Server-Sent Events) functionality. Connect to receive real-time events and test sending events to all connected clients.
sse.step1: Click the "Connect" button to establish an SSE connection. You'll receive a connection ID and start receiving heartbeat events every 30 seconds.
sse.step2: Use the "Send Test Event" button to broadcast test events to all connected clients, or send custom messages with your own content.
sse.step3: All connected clients will receive events in real-time. Open multiple browser tabs to see this in action.
sse.step4: The tRPC API allows backend services to send events to specific users or broadcast to all connected clients.
